extension.description:
Connects to Pushbullet's websocket stream to mirror notifications on xbmc.
It uses the following Python modules:
websocket-client https://pypi.python.org/pypi/websocket-client/ six https://pypi.python.org/pypi/six backports.ssl_match_hostname https://pypi.python.org/pypi/backports.ssl_match_hostname
